panels.description:
For each device, the number of EBGP peers configured.   
The devices are hardcoded in the queries.
panels.title: EBGP peers configured

panels.description:
For each device, the number of  BGP sessions state established.   
The devices are hardcoded in the queries.
panels.title: BGP sessions state established

panels.description:
The number of transitions to the BGP session state established .   
Select a device.  
The  neighbors are hardcoded in the queries
panels.title: Transitions to the BGP session state established (hardcoded neighbors)

panels.description:
The number of transitions to the BGP session state established .    
Hardcoded for device 100.123.1.0 only  
The  neighbors are hardcoded in the queries
panels.title: Transitions to the BGP session state established (on device 100.123.1.0 only)

panels.description:
The number of BGP prefixes received by 100.123.1.0.  
His neighbors are hardcoded.
panels.title: BGP prefixes received on device 100.123.1.0

panels.description:
The number of BGP prefixes sent by the device 100.123.1.0.   
His neighbors are hardcoded.
panels.title: BGP prefixes sent by  device 100.123.1.0

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM  "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/" with KEY = "device"
list.name: devices
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM  "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/" with KEY = "device"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM  "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/" with KEY = "system_id"
list.name: hostnames
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM  "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/" with KEY = "system_id"
